description:
Setting your perfect pressure is easier than ever. With an easy to read digital display, this pump adds a level of precision to getting your suspension dialed in.

  • Durable aluminum construction
  • Digital display is clear and easy to read
  • Rotatable hose allows for a more natural pump stroke
  • Non-scratch rubber sealing system
  • Micro-adjust release button (1-2PSI) for finding your perfect pressure
name: MEC Digital Shock Pump
